root.name: Cartoon Network: Punch Time Explosion
root.description: A fighting game in the style of Nintendo's Super Smash Bros. this game stars CN characters from past and present years.Roster (3DS):Ben 10Billy MandyBlossomBubblesButtercupCaptain K'nucklesCaptain Planet (Unlockable)Chowder KimchiDexterFatherFlapjackGrimMac and BlooMojo JojoMonkeyNumbuh OneSamurai JackVilgaxThe Xbox 360, PS3 and Wii version of the game include these characters as well as 8 more:Johnny BravoHimAkuScotsmanHoss DelgadoThe ToiletnatorYoung Ben TennysonKevin LevinAssists:Aku (3DS only)CheeseCocoDee DeeDraculaEduardoFred FredburgerFuzzy LumpkinsGazpachoGeneral Skarr (XL only)Gwen TennysonHim (3DS only)Johnny Bravo (3DS only)Kevin Levin (3DS only)Madame Foster (XL only)Major Glory (XL only)MandarkMung Daal (XL only)Numbuh TwoNumbuh Four (XL only)Panini (XL only)Peppermint Larry Candy WifeShnitzelStickybeardValhallen (XL only)The Vreedle Brothers
